titles.title: GI Bill Comparison Tool Improvement Act of 2018

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide information about whether educational institutions allow individuals to stay enrolled in courses of education pending receipt of educational assistance from the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
GI Bill Comparison Tool Improvement Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
GI Bill Comparison Tool Improvement Act of 2018
This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to provide information to veterans and members of the Armed Forces about whether certain postsecondary educational institutions allow students to stay enrolled in a course pending receipt of educational assistance from the VA.
